text: Euphorbia obcordata is a species of plant in the family Euphorbiaceae. It is endemic to Yemen. Its natural habitats are subtropical or tropical dry forests and rocky areas. ==References== obcordata Category:Endemic flora of Socotra Category:Vulnerable flora of Africa Category:Vulnerable flora of Asia Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot Category:Taxa named by Isaac Bayley Balfour
title: Euphorbia obcordata
